about_the_game:
Capybaras Chill in Hell is a cozy horror idle game where you can buy packs of capybaras, grow and raise them, and earn money to unlock rarer capybaras. Purchase upgrades, hellish lands, and decorations to boost your earnings. Collect them all and relax with your capybaras in an unholy environment filled with blood, pain, and agony.

We're here to prove that capybaras can relax anywhere. That's why we sent a bunch of them straight to hell, and now you have the chance to collect them all and relax alongside them.

- 107 different capybaras to collect, each with unique rarities, mutations, and variations

- Buy capybara packs, grow them, and earn tons of money

- Decorate your hellish land your way

- Enjoy watching capybaras chill in hell

- Hundreds of achievements to unlock, each capybara is an achievement

name: Capybaras Chill in Hell

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7+
  • Processor: 1.2Ghz+
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Capybaras Chill in Hell is a cozy horror idle game where you raise capybaras, earn money to unlock rare ones, and buy upgrades, lands, and decorations to increase earnings. The goal is to collect all the capybaras and relax in a hellish environment filled with blood and agony.
